message.content: This question requires knowledge about the signs and indicators of an impending rainstorm. When rain is about to fall, observers may note menacing skies, which can include dark clouds, lightning, and thunder. Option (A) is incorrect because beach weather typically refers to sunny and clear conditions. Option (B) is incorrect because bright days suggest clear weather without rain. Option (D) is unrelated to the signs of an upcoming rainstorm.
